paths <- list(wt1 = "./data-raw/wt1_mg.bed",

}

test <- buildMicrobeMethyl("./data-raw/wt1_mg.bed",
                           "wt1",

testfunc <- function(..., x = numeric()) {
  args <- list(...)
  if(length(args) == 0) {
    print("zero")

  else {
    print(args)
  }
  print(x)
